amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 37 in the Congressional Record of September 4, 1997, to prohibit the use of any funds in the bill to be used to support medical institutions' voluntary plans to reduce the number of medical residents, unless the Secretary of HHS certifies that the reduction plan will not reduce the number of primary care residents available to practice in under-served areas.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Emerson amendment was withdrawn.
